reviews.review: I DISLIKED the security of this game about hackers/cheaters...

expect cheaters in the beginning, will become less once you play a few real games.

This game is incredibly fun, but it's also a waste of your time.  There will always be someone better than you and you probably won't feel like you're improving at anything because you aren't. You have to out-aim and out-think your opponent, but sometimes that won't even net you any results because of janky online issues. Half the time you are battling against the game engine itself more than you are playing against the human players.

Best case scenario: You get super into this game, you love the online experience, the memes make you haha laugh, you found a new chill game to play with online friends, and your point-and-click skills improve. Cool.

Worst case scenario: You spend $100+ on cosmetics, lose a lot, get pissed off, get miserably addicted to ranked, and waste 400 hours of your life doing competitive point-and-shoot.

I think you're better off playing Super Smash Bros with your actual bros.
